headline: Krispy Kreme pauses its doughnut rollout with McDonald’s
summary: Krispy Kreme’s partnership with McDonald’s to sell its doughnuts at all of the burger chain’s US restaurants didn’t turn out as sweet as it thought.

headline: Invesco Dividend Income Fund Q1 2025 Commentary
summary: The fund outperformed the Russell 1000 Value Index due to strong stock selection in several sectors, despite underperformance in information technology, materials and financials.

headline: Invesco Diversified Dividend Fund Q1 2025 Commentary

headline: Burger King-parent Restaurant Brands' quarterly results miss on weak demand
summary: Restaurant Brandsmissed first-quarter revenue and profit estimates on Thursday,hurt by sluggish demand at its restaurant chains such as BurgerKing and Tim Hortons amid tariff-related uncertainty. ...
